name: MKI
tag_list: digital-agency, web-desing, web-development, social-media, marketring, seo, sem
overview:
MKI is a multidisciplinary digital agency. We believe in the digital future and create unique online marketing, communications and service solutions for our clients.

Our clientele represents commercial players from multinationals to start-ups, all searching for better digital concepts and ideas. We work on a broad range of assignments, from development of brand identity, or new service concepts, to orchestration of complex design projects for the digital environment.

We love asking questions, challenging accepted views and creating exciting digital content.
